item.title: LDDDL
item.description:
LDDDLï¼ˆLove’s date and deadlineï¼‰

Tell me a fairytale where love never ends, Vows are kept, through seasons and trends. Explain the date when love was kindled Because it touched my heart to twiddle.

Till I deemed that you’re the Mr. Right When you sold everything just for my delight. So, what is the love’s date If it weren’t to open a gate. What a shame, it…

Now I’m trapped in love’s deadline It means: “Love, Dead and Line”. “L” is not allowed to trans to “F”, Fine Just like the “M” left behind.
